channel.title: Take down advertisment section?
channel.description: Really needs to be taken down, or monitored. Not to sound like a prick but it really aint for for those good servers who have new sprites, completely new ideas and such and then hundreds of these rs2 idiots who cometo rsc and get a source and release the client.

item.title: Take down advertisment section?
item.dc:creator: @cr0ss cr0ss
item.description:
@cr0ss wrote:

[quote=“i_pk_pjers_i, post:4, topic:226567”][quote author=cr0ss link=topic=297726.msg2392458#msg2392458 date=1219010481]

Id agree, but then this section will get spammed to death.

We should probably remove those release links? Or atleast that topic? If a person REALLY wants a source, he will use search button. If he doesn’t get down to that, that means he is not qualified.

What do you think?
[/quote]I think that the section will just get spammed up with “Where can I find X source?” because people are incapable of searching, so keep the release links.[/quote]
Yeah, but now there are hundreds of servers with UNEDITED SOURCES, that last maybe for a week and everyone makes over 5 threads in a day about how great his server is. They usually get their buttbuddies around to do it.

Read full topic

We should probably remove those release links? Or atleast that topic? If a person REALLY wants a source, he will use search button. If he doesn’t get down to that, that means he is not qualified.
